search.query: | tstats count AS count from datamodel=NMON_Data_CPU where (nodename = CPU) (CPU.frameID="*") ($osfilter$) groupby "CPU.frameID", "CPU.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS count by "CPU.frameID" | rename "CPU.frameID" AS "frameID" | fields frameID | sort frameID

| tstats count AS count from datamodel=NMON_Data_CPU where (nodename = CPU) (CPU.frameID=$frameID$) (CPU.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($osfilter$) groupby "CPU.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS count by "CPU.hostname" | rename "CPU.hostname" AS hostname | fields hostname | sort hostname

div.h4: Nmon Analyser interfaces have been designed for focused time ranges, very large time ranges may require time to be fully processed
For long time analysis, please consider using metric dedicated interfaces available from App home pages

search.query: | tstats last("Nmon_Config.OStype") AS OStype last("Nmon_Config.OS_Level") AS OS_Level last("Nmon_Config.cpu_cores") AS cpu_cores last("Nmon_Config.Processor") AS Processor from datamodel=NMON_Config where (nodename = Nmon_Config) (Nmon_Config.$hostname$) groupby "Nmon_Config.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t last("Nmon_Config.OStype") AS OStype last("Nmon_Config.OS_Level") AS OS_Level last("Nmon_Config.cpu_cores") AS cpu_cores last("Nmon_Config.Processor") AS Processor by "Nmon_Config.hostname" | sort limit=0 "Nmon_Config.hostname" | fields - _span | rename "Nmon_Config.hostname" AS hostname | fields hostname, OStype, OS_Level, cpu_cores, Processor
fields OS_Level

single.option: | tstats last("Nmon_Config.OStype") AS OStype last("Nmon_Config.OS_Level") AS OS_Level last("Nmon_Config.cpu_cores") AS cpu_cores last("Nmon_Config.Processor") AS Processor from datamodel=NMON_Config where (nodename = Nmon_Config) (Nmon_Config.$hostname$) groupby "Nmon_Config.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t last("Nmon_Config.OStype") AS OStype last("Nmon_Config.OS_Level") AS OS_Level last("Nmon_Config.cpu_cores") AS cpu_cores last("Nmon_Config.Processor") AS Processor by "Nmon_Config.hostname" | sort limit=0 "Nmon_Config.hostname" | fields - _span | rename "Nmon_Config.hostname" AS hostname | fields hostname, OStype, OS_Level, cpu_cores, Processor

search.query: fields cpu_cores

single.option: | tstats last("Nmon_Config.OStype") AS OStype last("Nmon_Config.OS_Level") AS OS_Level last("Nmon_Config.cpu_cores") AS cpu_cores last("Nmon_Config.Processor") AS Processor from datamodel=NMON_Config where (nodename = Nmon_Config) (Nmon_Config.$hostname$) groupby "Nmon_Config.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t last("Nmon_Config.OStype") AS OStype last("Nmon_Config.OS_Level") AS OS_Level last("Nmon_Config.cpu_cores") AS cpu_cores last("Nmon_Config.Processor") AS Processor by "Nmon_Config.hostname" | sort limit=0 "Nmon_Config.hostname" | fields - _span | rename "Nmon_Config.hostname" AS hostname | fields hostname, OStype, OS_Level, cpu_cores, Processor

search.query: fields Processor

single.option: | tstats last("Nmon_Config.OStype") AS OStype last("Nmon_Config.OS_Level") AS OS_Level last("Nmon_Config.cpu_cores") AS cpu_cores last("Nmon_Config.Processor") AS Processor from datamodel=NMON_Config where (nodename = Nmon_Config) (Nmon_Config.$hostname$) groupby "Nmon_Config.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t last("Nmon_Config.OStype") AS OStype last("Nmon_Config.OS_Level") AS OS_Level last("Nmon_Config.cpu_cores") AS cpu_cores last("Nmon_Config.Processor") AS Processor by "Nmon_Config.hostname" | sort limit=0 "Nmon_Config.hostname" | fields - _span | rename "Nmon_Config.hostname" AS hostname | fields hostname, OStype, OS_Level, cpu_cores, Processor

search.query: | tstats max("CPU.lpar_vp_usage") AS vp_usage max("CPU.cpu_PCT") AS pct_usage from datamodel=NMON_Data_CPU where (nodename = CPU) (CPU.$hostname$) groupby _time, "CPU.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | bucket _time span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("CPU.lpar_vp_usage") AS vp_usage max("CPU.cpu_PCT") AS pct_usage by _time, "CPU.hostname" | eval usage=if(isnotnull(vp_usage), vp_usage, pct_usage) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=CPU_ALL OR type=LPAR,$hostname$)` $statsmode$(usage) AS $statsmode$_cpu_usage

drilldown.link: search?earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$&q=| tstats max("CPU.lpar_vp_usage") AS vp_usage max("CPU.cpu_PCT") AS pct_usage from datamodel=NMON_Data_CPU where (nodename = CPU) (CPU.$hostname$) groupby _time, "CPU.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | bucket _time span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("CPU.lpar_vp_usage") AS vp_usage max("CPU.cpu_PCT") AS pct_usage by _time, "CPU.hostname" | eval usage=if(isnotnull(vp_usage), vp_usage, pct_usage) | timechart span=1m $statsmode$(usage) AS $statsmode$_usage

search.query: | tstats max("DISKXFER.value") AS DISKXFER.value from datamodel=NMON_Data_DISKXFER where (nodename = DISKXFER) (DISKXFER.$hostname$) groupby _time, "DISKXFER.hostname", "DISKXFER.device" prestats=true span=1m | bucket _time span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("DISKXFER.value") AS DISKXFER.value by _time, "DISKXFER.hostname", "DISKXFER.device" | rename DISKXFER.hostname AS hostname, DISKXFER.device AS device, DISKXFER.value AS value | stats sum(value) As value by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKXFER,$hostname$)` $statsmode$(value) AS $statsmode$_iops_usage

drilldown.link: search?earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$&q=| tstats max("DISKXFER.value") AS DISKXFER.value from datamodel=NMON_Data_DISKXFER where (nodename = DISKXFER) (DISKXFER.$hostname$) groupby _time, "DISKXFER.hostname", "DISKXFER.device" prestats=true span=1m | bucket _time span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("DISKXFER.value") AS DISKXFER.value by _time, "DISKXFER.hostname", "DISKXFER.device" | rename DISKXFER.hostname AS hostname, DISKXFER.device AS device, DISKXFER.value AS value | stats sum(value) As value by _time | timechart span=1m $statsmode$(value) AS $statsmode$_iops_usage

search.query: | tstats `CPU_ALL(max)` from datamodel=NMON_Data_CPU where (nodename = CPU.CPU_ALL) (CPU.$hostname$) groupby _time, "CPU.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t `CPU_ALL(max)` by _time, "CPU.hostname" | timechart `inline_customspan(type=CPU_ALL,$hostname$)` avg("CPU.Idle_PCT") AS "Idle %", avg("CPU.Sys_PCT") AS "Sys %", avg("CPU.User_PCT") AS "User %", avg("CPU.Wait_PCT") AS "Wait %", avg("CPU.cpu_PCT") AS "CPU %"
fields _time,"Idle %","Sys %","User %","Wait %"

drilldown.link: search?earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$&q=| tstats `CPU_ALL(max)` from datamodel=NMON_Data_CPU where (nodename = CPU.CPU_ALL) (CPU.$hostname$) groupby _time, "CPU.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t `CPU_ALL(max)` by _time, "CPU.hostname" | timechart span=1m avg("CPU.Idle_PCT") AS "Idle_PCT", avg("CPU.Sys_PCT") AS "Sys_PCT", avg("CPU.User_PCT") AS "User_PCT", avg("CPU.Wait_PCT") AS "Wait_PCT"

search.query: fields _time,"CPU %"

drilldown.link: search?earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$&q=| tstats `CPU_ALL(max)` from datamodel=NMON_Data_CPU where (nodename = CPU.CPU_ALL) (CPU.$hostname$) groupby _time, "CPU.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t `CPU_ALL(max)` by _time, "CPU.hostname" | timechart span=1m avg("CPU.cpu_PCT") AS "CPU_PCT"

search.query: | tstats max("TOP_Solaris.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_Solaris where (nodename = TOP_Solaris) (TOP_Solaris.$hostname$) groupby _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_Solaris.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU by _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" | rename "TOP_Solaris.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_Solaris.Command" AS Command "TOP_Solaris.PID" AS PID | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where (pct_CPU<=limit) | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,Command | eval usage_per_core=(pct_CPU/100) | stats sum(usage_per_core) As usage_per_core by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(usage_per_core) as "CPU Usage per core" by Command

chart.title: Physical Memory (RSS) Usage per command invocation

search.query: | tstats max("TOP_Solaris.ResSize") AS ResSize from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_Solaris where (nodename = TOP_Solaris) (TOP_Solaris.$hostname$) groupby _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_Solaris.ResSize") AS ResSize by _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" | rename "TOP_Solaris.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_Solaris.Command" AS Command "TOP_Solaris.PID" AS PID | stats sum(ResSize) As ResSize by _time,Command | eval Phys_Mem_MB=round(((ResSize)/1024),2) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(Phys_Mem_MB) as "Phys_Memory" by Command

chart.title: Virtual Memory (SIZE) Usage per command invocation

search.query: | tstats max("TOP_Solaris.Size") AS Size from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_Solaris where (nodename = TOP_Solaris) (TOP_Solaris.$hostname$) groupby _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_Solaris.Size") AS Size by _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" | rename "TOP_Solaris.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_Solaris.Command" AS Command "TOP_Solaris.PID" AS PID | stats sum(Size) As Size by _time,Command | eval Virt_Mem_MB=round(((Size)/1024),2) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(Virt_Mem_MB) as "Virt_Memory" by Command

| tstats max("TOP_Solaris.Paging") AS Paging from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_Solaris where (nodename = TOP_Solaris) (TOP_Solaris.$hostname$) groupby _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_Solaris.Paging") AS Paging by _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" | rename "TOP_Solaris.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_Solaris.Command" AS Command "TOP_Solaris.PID" AS PID | stats sum(Paging) As Paging by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(Paging) as "Paging" by Command

| tstats max("TOP_Solaris.Threads") AS Threads from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_Solaris where (nodename = TOP_Solaris) (TOP_Solaris.$hostname$) groupby _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_Solaris.Threads") AS Threads by _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" | rename "TOP_Solaris.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_Solaris.Command" AS Command "TOP_Solaris.PID" AS PID | stats sum(Threads) As Threads by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(Threads) as "Threads" by Command

| tstats max("TOP_Solaris.CharIO") AS CharIO from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_Solaris where (nodename = TOP_Solaris) (TOP_Solaris.$hostname$) groupby _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_Solaris.CharIO") AS CharIO by _time, "TOP_Solaris.hostname", "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus", "TOP_Solaris.Command", "TOP_Solaris.PID" | rename "TOP_Solaris.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_Solaris.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_Solaris.Command" AS Command "TOP_Solaris.PID" AS PID | stats sum(CharIO) As CharIO by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan(type=TOP,$hostname$)` useother=f limit=0 max(CharIO) as "I/O" by Command

| tstats max(FILE.readch) As readch, max(FILE.writech) As writech max(FILE.iget) As iget, max(FILE.namei) As namei, max(FILE.dirblk) As dirblk max(FILE.ttycanch) As ttycanch, max(FILE.ttyoutch) As ttyoutch, max(FILE.ttyrawch) As ttyrawch from datamodel=NMON_Data_FILE where (nodename = FILE) (FILE.$hostname$) groupby _time, "FILE.hostname" prestats=true `inline_customspan(type=FILE,$hostname$)` | timechart `inline_customspan(type=FILE,$hostname$)` max(FILE.readch) As readch, max(FILE.writech) As writech max(FILE.iget) As iget, max(FILE.namei) As namei, max(FILE.dirblk) As dirblk max(FILE.ttycanch) As ttycanch, max(FILE.ttyoutch) As ttyoutch, max(FILE.ttyrawch) As ttyrawch
fields _time,readch,writech

drilldown.link: search?earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$&q=| tstats max(FILE.readch) As readch, max(FILE.writech) As writech from datamodel=NMON_Data_FILE where (nodename = FILE) (FILE.$hostname$) groupby _time, "FILE.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | timechart span=1m max(FILE.readch) As readch, max(FILE.writech) As writech

search.query: fields _time,iget,namei,dirblk,ttycanch,ttyoutch,ttyrawch

drilldown.link: search?earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$&q=| tstats max(FILE.iget) As iget, max(FILE.namei) As namei, max(FILE.dirblk) As dirblk max(FILE.ttycanch) As ttycanch, max(FILE.ttyoutch) As ttyoutch, max(FILE.ttyrawch) As ttyrawch from datamodel=NMON_Data_FILE where (nodename = FILE) (FILE.$hostname$) groupby _time, "FILE.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | timechart span=1m max(FILE.iget) As iget, max(FILE.namei) As namei, max(FILE.dirblk) As dirblk max(FILE.ttycanch) As ttycanch, max(FILE.ttyoutch) As ttyoutch, max(FILE.ttyrawch) As ttyrawch

search.query: | tstats max("PROC.Runnable") AS Runnable max("PROC.Swap_in") AS Swap_in max("PROC.pswitch") AS pswitch max("PROC.syscall") AS syscall max("PROC.fork") AS fork max("PROC.exec") AS exec from datamodel=NMON_Data_PROC where (nodename = PROC) (PROC.$hostname$) groupby _time, "PROC.hostname" prestats=true `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` | timechart `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` max("PROC.Runnable") AS Runnable max("PROC.Swap_in") AS Swap_in max("PROC.pswitch") AS pswitch max("PROC.syscall") AS syscall max("PROC.fork") AS fork max("PROC.exec") AS exec

chart.title: PROC, Kernel Threads in run queue and to be paged (RunQueue, Swap-In)

search.query: fields _time,Runnable,Swap_in

drilldown.link: search?earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$&q=| tstats max("PROC.Runnable") AS Runnable max("PROC.Swap_in") AS Swap_in from datamodel=NMON_Data_PROC where (nodename = PROC) (PROC.$hostname$) groupby _time, "PROC.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | timechart span=1m max("PROC.Runnable") AS Runnable max("PROC.Swap_in") AS Swap_in

chart.title: PROC, Context switches and system calls (pswitch, syscall)

search.query: fields _time,pswitch,syscall

drilldown.link: search?earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$&q=| tstats max("PROC.pswitch") AS pswitch max("PROC.syscall") AS syscall from datamodel=NMON_Data_PROC where (nodename = PROC) (PROC.$hostname$) groupby _time, "PROC.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | timechart span=1m max("PROC.pswitch") AS pswitch max("PROC.syscall") AS syscall

chart.title: PROC, Fork and Exec system calls (fork, exec)

search.query: fields _time,fork,exec

drilldown.link: search?earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$&q=| tstats max("PROC.fork") AS fork max("PROC.exec") AS exec from datamodel=NMON_Data_PROC where (nodename = PROC) (PROC.$hostname$) groupby _time, "PROC.hostname" prestats=true span=1m | timechart span=1m max("PROC.fork") AS fork max("PROC.exec") AS exec

chart.title: PROCSOL, Percentage of Time All processes have spent in: (estimation since terminated processes are not accounted)

search.query: | tstats max("PROCSOL.USR") As "USR (%time in User Mode)", max("PROCSOL.SYS") As "SYS (%time in System Mode)", max("PROCSOL.TRP") As "TRP (%time Processing system traps)", max("PROCSOL.TFL") As "TFL (%time Processing text page faults)", max("PROCSOL.DFL") As "DFL (%time Processing data page faults)", max("PROCSOL.LAT") As "LAT (%time Waiting for CPU)" from datamodel=NMON_Data_PROCSOL where (nodename = PROCSOL) (PROCSOL.$hostname$) groupby _time, "PROCSOL.frameID", "PROCSOL.hostname" prestats=true `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` | timechart `inline_customspan(type=PROC,$hostname$)` max("PROCSOL.USR") As "USR (%time in User Mode)", max("PROCSOL.SYS") As "SYS (%time in System Mode)", max("PROCSOL.TRP") As "TRP (%time Processing system traps)", max("PROCSOL.TFL") As "TFL (%time Processing text page faults)", max("PROCSOL.DFL") As "DFL (%time Processing data page faults)", max("PROCSOL.LAT") As "LAT (%time Waiting for CPU)"

chart.title: VM, (pages/s) Minor faults and major faults
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(minfaults) As minfaults, max(majfaults) As majfaults

chart.title: VM, (pages/s) Pages IN and OUT
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pgin) As pgin, max(pgout) As pgout

chart.title: VM, (pages/s) Pages examined and freed by pageout daemon
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(scans) As scans, max(reclaims) As reclaims

chart.title: VM, (KB/s) Pages paged IN and OUT
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pgpgin) As pgpgin, max(pgpgout) As pgpgout

chart.title: VM, (KB/s) Pages swapped IN and OUT
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pswpin) As pswpin, max(pswpout) As pswpout

chart.title: VM, (KB/s) Pages freed by daemon or auto
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="VM" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=VM,$hostname$)` max(pgfree) As pgfree

chart.title: MEM, Memory usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | eval memused=round((memtotal-memfree),0) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,$hostname$)` Max(memtotal) As memtotal, Max(memused) As memused

chart.title: MEM, Swap usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | eval swapused=round((swaptotal-swapfree),0) | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,$hostname$)` Max(swaptotal) As swaptotal, Max(swapused) As swapused

chart.title: MEMUSE, Cache Hit Ratio (%)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMUSE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEMUSE,$hostname$)` max(PCTrcache) As PCT_rcache, max(PCTwcache) As PCT_wcache

chart.title: MEMUSE, System Buffer Accesses
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMUSE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEMUSE,$hostname$)` max(lread) As lread, max(lwrite) As lwrite

chart.title: MEMUSE, Transfers using raw (physical) device mechanism
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMUSE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEMUSE,$hostname$)` max(pread) As pread, max(pwrite) As pwrite

chart.title: MEMUSE, Transfer of data between system buffers and disk or other block device
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMUSE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEMUSE,$hostname$)` max(bread) As bread, max(bwrite) As bwrite

chart.title: DISKBSIZE, Average data transfer size
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKBSIZE*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As avg_transfer_size by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKBSIZE,$hostname$)` max(avg_transfer_size) As avg_transfer_size

chart.title: DISKBUSY, Disk Busy Activity
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKBUSY*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As busy_time by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKBUSY,$hostname$)` max(busy_time) As busy_time

chart.title: DISKREAD, Disk Read Data Rate
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKREAD*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As read_data_rate by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKREAD,$hostname$)` max(read_data_rate) As read_data_rate

chart.title: DISKWRITE, Disk Write Data Rate
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKWRITE*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As write_data_rate by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKWRITE,$hostname$)` max(write_data_rate) As write_data_rate

chart.title: DISKXFER, Disk I/O Operations per second (IOPS)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKXFER*" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As IOPS by _time | timechart `inline_customspan(type=DISKXFER,$hostname$)` max(IOPS) As IOPS

chart.title: JFSFILE, Percentage Usage of File-systems
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="JFSFILE" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 useother=f `inline_customspan(type=JFSFILE,$hostname$)` avg(value) As pct_fs_used by device

chart.title: NET - Network Interfaces Activity by Host
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NET" $hostname$ | eval rate=round((value/1000),2) | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan(type=NET,$hostname$)` max(rate) As rate by device

chart.title: NETPACKET - Number of read/write packets
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NETPACKET" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan(type=NETPACKET,$hostname$)` max(value) As value by device

chart.title: NETERROR - Number of errors packets
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NETERROR" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan(type=NETERROR,$hostname$)` max(value) As value by device
